title: User Accounts and Authorization Management Procedure (PIT-S130-0215) | Yönerge
text: Procedure No PIT-S130-0215V11 Effective Date 13-01-2012 Update Date 12-06-2024 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Bilgi Güvenliğini Yönetme Yönergesi (IIT-S130-02) Aim Managing user accounts and access to IT services Scope This procedure covers opening and closing user accounts and granting access to services in the IT service catalog. Definitions / Abbreviations HR : Human Resources IT: Information Technologies SUTicket : Call Recording/Tracking Application SU-Net Account: A uniquely defined account used for accessing and authorizing IT services Implementation Steps: Responsibility Outputs/ Timing 1. New Employee Accounts 1.1. HR provides user information via the workflow application. HR Before starting work 1.2. If appropriate, the IT Officer will arrange an address for the new employee in the format name.surname@sabanciuniv.edu . If the name and surname have already been assigned to another user, the user will be consulted regarding the use of a middle name. IT Officer Account opening / 1 business day 1.3. A call will be made via SUTicket for the user's computer preparations, and preparations will be made in accordance with the Hardware and Software Provisioning (PIT-S130-0123) procedure. IT Officer SUTicket 1.4. User access information will be sent to the user's mobile phone via SMS. IT Officer SUTicket 2. Resigned Employee Accounts 2.1. HR provides resigned user information to IT via the workflow application. HR 5 days before leaving work 2.2. A notification message will be sent to the resigned or terminated user regarding the account closure. The user's account will be closed on the user's last working day. The resigned user's account will not be forwarded to another person's account at the University. IT Officer Last business day 2.3. All access permissions previously granted to IT services for users whose accounts are closed will be revoked. IT Officer Access authorization revocation / account closure 2.4. The accounts of users who resigned due to " SU retirement " Emeritus, Honorary Member, or Outstanding Service status will not be closed. Access permissions granted to IT services will be revoked. Based on information received from the Human Resources department, the email address will be formatted as name.surname@connect .sabanciuniv.edu or name.surname@emeritus.sabanciuniv.edu . The old email address will be forwarded to the new address. IT Officer Account Editing / Authorization revocation 2.5. Full-time academic staff who leave their jobs or whose employment contracts are terminated will receive a notification message informing them that their account will be closed. The account will be closed on the user's last working day. Messages received from academic staff members's; accounts will be forwarded to another address for a maximum of one year. HR will request this upon their request. IT Systems Officer Authorization revocation / On the specified date 2.6. If a resigning user requests access to their emails, they will be granted access to their email messages for a limited period, subject to approval by their faculty/unit prior to departure and through a suitable method determined by the IT department. Related unit/faculty Authorization revocation / On the specified date 3. Temporary Accounts 3.1. Account requests for individuals such as researchers and consultants temporarily residing at the university are submitted to IT via the Workflow application. Related unit/faculty Account request/ 3.2. The user is notified of the opened account information. IT Officer Information/ 1 business day 4. New Subcontractor Accounts 4.1. Subcontractor employee information is submitted to IT via the Workflow application by the relevant unit. Related unit Before starting work 4.2. The IT Officer creates an account for the new user in the format name.surname@sabanciuniv.edu and opens an SUTicket with the System team for account definitions. IT Officer SUTicket 4.3. The IT Officer performs the account opening procedures. IT Officer Account opening / 1 business day 5. Resigning Subcontractor Accounts 5.1. The relevant unit submits subcontractor termination information to IT via the Workflow application. Related unit 5 days before departure 5.2. A notification message regarding account closure is sent to a user who resigns or whose employment contract is terminated. The user's account is closed on the user's last working day. IT Officer Anotification / last business day ccount closure 6. Generic Accounts 6.1. Account requests for purposes such as unit contact addresses and conference messaging addresses are submitted to IT via SUTicket . Requester SUTicket 6.2. The IT officer handles the account creation process, using the address requested.unit@sabanciuniv.edu IT Officer Account opening / 4 hours after request 6.3. Account information is provided to the requester, and if necessary, adjustments are made for account usage. IT Officer Notification / Within 1 business day 7. Student Accounts Beginning at the University 7.1. New students create their own accounts at newcomers.sabanciuniv.edu, using the address firstname.lastname@sabanciuniv.edu . If the first name and last name have already been assigned to another user, the user is consulted regarding the use of a middle name. Students Account creation / 7.2. Undergraduate and graduate students will have the word " Students" added to their names. IT Officer Account creation / 8. Üniversiteden Ayrılan Öğrenci Hesapları 8.1. Upon notification of withdrawal from Student Resources, the departing student will receive an informational message regarding account closure. The account will be closed on the closure date specified in the message. IT Officer Notification / 8.2. Accounts of graduating students will not be closed. The email address and domain will be adjusted to firstname.lastname@alumni.sabanciuniv.edu . If the first name and last name have previously been assigned to another user, the user will be consulted regarding their preference for a second name. The old email address will be forwarded to the newly created address. IT Officer Notification / Student Resources 8.3. Access authorizations granted to IT services for students who leave and graduate will be revoked. IT Officer IT Officer Account closure / On the specified date 8.4. The account of the deceased user will be closed. If the legal heirs request this in writing within three months of the user's death, the email content from the relevant email account will be delivered to the legal heirs of the deceased user. 9. Access to IT Services 9.1. Requests for access to IT services are forwarded to IT through a workflow application. Personel Access request form / 9.2. The request is approved by the employee's manager and IT administrator. Managers Request approval 9.3. The service request is recorded in SUTicket , and the IT Officer grants access to the relevant system. IT Officer Access authorization / Within 1 day 10. Account and Access Definitions for Administrative Service Applications 10.1. Access requests to administrative service applications (Banner and SAP) are made in accordance with section 9 of this procedure. Personnel Access request to administrative services applications / 10.2. If the user requesting access does not already have an account in the system, a new account is created for the user. A password is determined in accordance with section 11 of this procedure. BT Sistem Sorumlusu Hesap oluşturma / 1 gün içinde 10.3. The requested access permissions for the user account are defined. IT Systems Officer Access authorization / Within 1 day 10.4. If the user changes units, access permissions are revoked. If the user leaves work, section 2 of this procedure is followed. IT Systems Officer Access authorization revocation /Within 1 day 11. Access to SU-Net 11.1. The MAC address of the network card of the hardware that will access the wired network is recorded through the MAC Address Registration application ( https://mysu.sabanciuniv.edu/apps/sumac/) Users (student/staff) MAC adress / 11.2. The user accesses the network by connecting their hardware to the wireless network using their user information. If unable to access, they request assistance via SUTicket . Users (student/staff) Network access/ 12. Server Hosting and Access Rights Barındırma ve Erişim Hakları 12.1. The request regarding the server to be hosted is forwarded to IT via SUTicket . Personnel SUTicket 12.2. The IT officer reviews the request. If appropriate, the server owner signs the System Room Server Acceptance and Operation Certificate (FIT-S13001-12) Personel Operation Certificate / Within 2 days of application 12.3. The server is placed into service according to the Server Systems Management Procedure (PIT-S13001-12) IT Systems Officer Server commissioning / 1 week after signature 12.4. The server's access to the local network and the Internet is determined by the network manager. IT Network Officer Server network access 13. Password Rules 13.1. The password rules for the SU-Net account are as follows: The password must be at least 8 characters. The new password must be different from the previous password. All characters must not be numbers. It should not be the same as any password used in external environments such as social media. Users (student/staff) Password / 14. Email signatures and information messages: 14.1. Employee email signatures are added to the central email system based on HR information. They cannot be changed in a way that would harm the university's corporate image. Support for signature changes in the email client is not provided. 14.2. Informational messages (conferences, promotions, etc.) to be added to the email subfolder may be requested by the PKI or the Rectorate/General Secretariat. This information is applied to all email addresses by IT.
